import module namespace race = "http://grechaw.github.io/entity-types#Race-0.0.1" at "/ext/Race-0.0.1.xqy";
(: This script runs extract functions to verify the initial import and how extraction looks :) let $runner-e := race:extract-instance-Runner( doc("/home/cgreer/source/xdmp-entity-services/entity-services-examples/data/simple-race-0.0.1/runners/xaw.json")) let $run-e := race:extract-instance-Run( doc("/home/cgreer/source/xdmp-entity-services/entity-services-examples/data/simple-race-0.0.1/runs/138.json")) let $race-e := race:extract-instance-Race( doc("/home/cgreer/source/xdmp-entity-services/entity-services-examples/data/simple-race-0.0.1/races/10k2.json")) return ( $runner-e, $run-e, race:instance-to-envelope($run-e), $race-e, race:instance-to-envelope($race-e) )

SELECT l.name, l.wonByRunner, l.courseLength, rr.id, rr.distance, rr.duration, rr.runByRunner FROM Race l, Race_comprisedOfRuns r, Run rr where l.name = r.name and r.comprisedOfRuns = rr.id and l.name = 'Half Marathon One' order by rr.duration limit 1

SELECT distance, count(*) FROM "Run" GROUP by distance ORDER by distance
-- limit 1
